sentences.en: Ezra Pound is the pioneer of the Imagist Movement in the western world.
sentences.cn: 艾兹拉·庞德是意象运动的发起人.

sentences.en: Much subsequent poetry in england was influenced by imagist lord and practice .
sentences.cn: 后来的英国诗歌中有许多诗受到了意象主义的箴言和实践的影响。

sentences.en: Much subsequent poetry in England was influenced by Imagist lord and practice.
sentences.cn: 后来的英国诗歌中有许多诗受到了意象主义的箴言和实践的影响.

sentences.en: With the help of Chinese classical poetry, Pounds Imagist movement and Vorticist movement achieve great success.
sentences.cn: 后者丰富的意象 、 深刻的主题与精炼的语言给庞德的意象主义运动与漩涡主义运动以巨大的帮助.
